about_the_game:
Overview


Trace the location of the message.

You will awaken in the middle of nowhere, devoid of memory.
Thus, you must find evidence of your current situation.

In this world, you can move anywhere within reach.

But, be cautious.
There are many creatures that could pose a threat to you.

Moreover, the ground itself is a labyrinth.
As you are not a superhero, you cannot climb on the steep ground or fly through the air.

Search for useful items that may protect you.
Best of luck!

key features


Players control a character who moves freely to reach the designated goal.

However, during the journey to the goal, the path is restricted by the terrain's elevation and slope, and animals and monsters intermittently attack the player, hindering their movement.

Players can obtain randomly provided items within the game space to counter these obstacles.

content_descriptors.notes: During gameplay, players may engage in combat with specific targets that are non-human entities within the game. Scenes depicting violence against these targets using the player character's body or weapons provided in the game may occur. If you find this content inappropriate, we recommend refraining from playing the game.

name: Trace

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1050
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11/etc
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1050
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek

short_description: Third-person RPG with messenger tracking exploration
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Swedish, Traditional Chinese
